dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: April 10th?! Are you serious right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: April tenth?! Are you serious right now?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The organization clarified that they plan to resume work on April 10.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, what's the big deal, A?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, what's the big deal, A?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The big deal? It's a botanical garden! Closed until April 10th because of, like, 'fallen trees and broken branches'?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The big deal? It's a botanical garden! Closed until April tenth because of, like, 'fallen trees and broken branches'?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to yesterday's hurricane in the city, the Botanical Garden will be closed to visitors until April 10. It is currently difficult to move around the Botanical Garden due to fallen trees and broken branches.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, because, uh, safety first, right? They said it's difficult to move around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, because, uh, safety first, right? They said it's difficult to move around.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is currently difficult to move around the Botanical Garden due to fallen trees and broken branches.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: 'Difficult to move around'? How bad was this 'hurricane'? Do they need a month to pick up some sticks?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Difficult to move around'? How bad was this 'hurricane'? Do they need a month to pick up some sticks?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to yesterday's hurricane in the city, the Botanical Garden will be closed to visitors until April 10.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It wasn't just 'some sticks,' A. They're talking about, um, 'hazardous trees falling' and checking the condition of plantings. That takes time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It wasn't just 'some sticks,' A. They're talking about, um, 'hazardous trees falling' and checking the condition of plantings. That takes time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Therefore, we need to clean up the public area and also check the condition of the plantings to eliminate the possibility of hazardous trees falling," the organization said in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: 'Hazardous trees.' Sounds like, uh, they're really overselling it. What about the magnolias? They're fine, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Hazardous trees.' Sounds like, uh, they're really overselling it. What about the magnolias? They're fine, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Botanical Garden reported that the magnolias have already bloomed and, fortunately, were not damaged.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the swans are doing well too. So it's not, like, total devastation. They're being responsible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the swans are doing well too. So it's not, like, total devastation. They're being responsible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The swans living on the garden's territory are also feeling well.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Responsible? They apologize for 'temporary inconvenience,' but it's, like, prime blooming season. Nobody can even see them!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Responsible? They apologize for 'temporary inconvenience,' but it's, like, prime blooming season. Nobody can even see them!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Botanical Garden apologized for the temporary inconvenience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They said they were 'not damaged,' A. So they will be there when it reopens. They're doing this for everyone's long-term enjoyment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They said they were 'not damaged,' A. So they will be there when it reopens. They're doing this for everyone's long-term enjoyment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Botanical Garden reported that the magnolias have already bloomed and, fortunately, were not damaged.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Long-term? I bet they could have, uh, cleared that up faster. April 10th just seems excessive for a few fallen branches.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Long-term? I bet they could have, uh, cleared that up faster. April tenth just seems excessive for a few fallen branches.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The organization clarified that they plan to resume work on April 10.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You don't know that. They're a botanical garden, they're professionals. They know what they're doing with, um, plant care and public safety.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You don't know that. They're a botanical garden, they're professionals. They know what they're doing with, um, plant care and public safety.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Professionals who, like, let a 'hurricane' make it impassable for weeks. Just saying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Professionals who, like, let a 'hurricane' make it impassable for weeks. Just saying.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to yesterday's hurricane in the city, the Botanical Garden will be closed to visitors... It is currently difficult to move around the Botanical Garden due to fallen trees and broken branches.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It was a hurricane, A! You can't just, uh, snap your fingers and fix hurricane damage overnight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It was a hurricane, A! You can't just, uh, snap your fingers and fix hurricane damage overnight.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to yesterday's hurricane in the city, the Botanical Garden will be closed to visitors until April 10.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I guess the swans will have the place to themselves for a while, huh? Lucky them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I guess the swans will have the place to themselves for a while, huh? Lucky them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The swans living on the garden's territory are also feeling well.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: At least someone's happy about it. Good grief.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At least someone's happy about it. Good grief.
